name: Thrall
storyline: I am Estralla Johnson, the greatest paranormal investigator in Crescent City. Until my lovers plotted my untimely demise. Now we're stuck in a tomb-like maze underground. I have to escape, but I also need answers to why I'm dead. So I rely on them, Zane Pagan and Lazarus Lockehart. walking a tightrope between reignited love and bloodshed.
summary: To be enthralled by love is murder on the soul in this paranormal, point-and-click, otome visual novel.
